overview: The film is a true and faithful retelling of Saint Dominicâ€™s life that it even allows viewers to meet him in an almost personal way. It was created in celebration of the 40th year of foundation of the Dominican Province of the Philippines. It is also the gift of the Province to the whole Dominican Family for the 800th anniversary year of the Order in 2016
tagline: The life of St. Dominic de Guzman and his mission to preach.
title: Dominic: Light of the Church
